text:
When rendering a PDF from docs/examples/svg/external.fo, the SVG in 
the "scaling" section of the document are being clipped on the right-hand side 
and bottom.  This was initally noted using JDK 1.2.2 on Solaris 2.6 and was 
later found to happen with JDK 1.4 and Win2k.
creator: raultman@fcci-group.com

text: *** Bug 16672 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: pascal.sancho@takoma.fr

text: no output PDF file provided that shows problem; problem description does not specify details of clipping; attempt to reproduce does not show clipping
creator: gadams@apache.org
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition resolved+wontfix to closed+wontfix; if you believe this remains a bug and can demonstrate it with appropriate input FO file and output PDF file (as applicable), then you may reopen
